__e: If so, why isn't Lester's wife dead?
Lester, isn't this supposed to be the time... you tell me how all-fired fucking important this is?
I told Lester that I can't do it anymore not with the girls.
Lester told me you were... odd.
I had known for weeks that there was something wrong, but Lester said it was just stress.
At lunch. Mr. Lester said not to take any calls this afternoon.
In-in case you did not hear, This-this other lester is stupid.
Listen, I know it's not my case, but I'd like your permission to go back to Lester's house and see what he has to say.
